2019 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

74 Jordan Harris

Position Offensive Line

Height 6-6

Weight 340

Class Senior

Prev School Valdosta State University

Hometown Decatur, Ga.

Bio

Related

Stats

Moments

Biography

2019: Appeared in seven games for the Saints during only season in the Blue and Gold, making five starts … helped anchor an offensive line that ranked fifth in the South Atlantic Conference with 356.6 yards per game … part of a line that allowed just 17 sacks on the season … helped the offense generate over 350 yards in a game five times during the 2019 season … helped paved the way for a program-record four rushing touchdowns to go with 448 yards of total offense in a 41-25 win at UNC Pembroke (9/28) … Saints followed up with a program-record 600 yards of total offense along with 266 rushing yards in a 52-24 win over Catawba (10/5) … guided team to 335 yards of offense at Mars Hill (10/19) … opened up lanes for 184 rushing yards in a win at UVa-Wise (11/2) … led the offensive unit to 388 yards of total offense against Carson-Newman (11/9) … team rushed for 223 yards on 53 carries in 14-7 setback at Newberry (11/16).

Valdosta State University

2018: Played in 10 games for the Blazers as a junior … helped lead Valdosta State to an undefeated season and the 2018 NCAA Division II National Championship … Blazers put up 537 yards of total offense in a 55-6 win over Fort Valley State (9/8) … team followed up with 535 yards of offense at West Alabama (9/15) … helped VSU rack up 614 yards of total offense at Mississippi College (9/29) … saw action in a 59-28 win over Delta State (10/6) … helped team to a win at Florida Tech (10/13) … played against North Greenville (10/20) … team rushed for 391 yards in a 48-21 win at West Florida (11/3) … Blazers posted 549 yards of total offense in a 66-16 NCAA playoff win over Bowie State (11/24) … saw action in a 61-21 playoff win over Lenoir-Rhyne (12/1) … played in the NCAA National Semifinals win against Notre Dame College (12/8).

Coahoma Community College

2017: Played for the Tigers during sophomore season.

2016: No information available.

High School: No information available.

Personal: No information available.
